Package com.jubiman.customdatalib.player

Class CustomPlayerRegistry

java.lang.Object
com.jubiman.customdatalib.api.CustomDataRegistry<Long>
com.jubiman.customdatalib.player.CustomPlayerRegistry
public class CustomPlayerRegistry extends CustomDataRegistry<Long>
Registry where mods can register CustomPlayers

  • Field Summary

    static final CustomPlayerRegistry

  • Method Details

    • registerClass

      public static void registerClass(String identifier, Class<? extends CustomPlayersHandler<? extends CustomPlayer>> clazz)
      Register a new CustomPlayersHandler class. Used by individual mods
      Parameters:
      identifier - the name of the class
      clazz - a reference to the class

    • serverTickAll

      public static void serverTickAll(necesse.engine.network.server.Server server)
      Server ticks all registered CustomPlayers. Please do not call this function as it's called every tick when Necesse's server ticks.
      Parameters:
      server - the server to tick from

    • saveAll

      public void saveAll(necesse.engine.save.SaveData save, long authentication)
      Saves player data from all registered CustomPlayers classes
      Parameters:
      save - the SaveData to save to
      authentication - the authentication of the player to save

    • loadAllEnter

      public void loadAllEnter(necesse.engine.save.LoadData data, long authentication)
      Loads all registered CustomPlayers, is called before the rest of the player is loaded
      Parameters:
      data - the LoadData to load from
      authentication - the authentication of the player to load

    • loadAllExit

      public void loadAllExit(necesse.engine.save.LoadData data, long authentication)
      Loads all registered CustomPlayers, is called after the rest of the player is loaded
      Parameters:
      data - the LoadData to load from
      authentication - the authentication of the player to load

    • stopAll

      public void stopAll()
      Stops all registered CustomPlayers. Please do not call this function as it's called when Necesse's server stops.

    • removeUser

      public void removeUser(long authentication)
      Removes a player from all registered CustomPlayers. Please do not call this function as it's called when Necesse's server stops.
      Parameters:
      authentication - the authentication of the player to remove

    • sendSyncPackets

      public void sendSyncPackets(long authentication, necesse.engine.network.server.ServerClient serverClient)
      Sends all sync packets from all registered CustomPlayers
      Parameters:
      authentication - the authentication of the player to send the sync packets to
      serverClient - the serverClient to send the sync packets to

    • registerListeners

      public void registerListeners()
      Register all event listeners, should not be called by mods
